title: MNF Preview: Chiefs-Ravens Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 9/28)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by R.J. White to preview the early Game of the Year from a gambling perspective. The previous 2 MVPs and consensus 'futures of the league', Patrick Mahomes and Lamar Jackson, square off in this primetime matchup! Can you really bet against the defending Super Bowl champs as an underdog? Actually, the books might be begging you to make that decision. The guys go over their game picks before getting into player props to target and how to build the ideal DFS lineup for tonight.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @rjwhite1
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
